reasoning_log: The matching process relied on identifying unique room types and specific features mentioned in the tags. Public facilities (Lobby, Gym, Parking) were matched immediately (Desc 6, 7, 8 to Images 6, 7, 8). Bathrooms were differentiated by the presence of a bathtub (Desc 5 -> Image 5, featuring a tub and wooden ceiling) versus a dedicated shower stall (Desc 3 -> Image 3). The bedroom (Desc 4) was uniquely identified by its wood floor, AC unit, and built-in storage (Image 4). The three living room descriptions (Desc 1, 2, 9) were matched based on perspective: Desc 9 explicitly mentions the '書櫃平台' (bookshelf platform) and '另一角度' (another angle), aligning with Image 9 which highlights this unique feature and the wall decal. Desc 1 was assigned to the main, wide living room view showing the balcony (Image 1). Desc 2, focusing on '動線區' (flow/circulation), was assigned to Image 2, which captures the central axis and transition area of the apartment.

matching_result_list.evidence: Wide view of the main living room showing the balcony access and extensive built-in storage, matching the primary '客廳' description.
Image focuses on the central flow path and open space, showing the transition from the living area (TV wall) into the hallway, matching '客廳/餐廳動線區' and '動線順暢'.
Standard guest bathroom featuring a fully enclosed glass shower stall, confirming '乾濕分離' (wet/dry separation).
The only bedroom image, featuring wood flooring, extensive system storage cabinets, and a visible AC unit, matching '臥室一' tags.
Master bathroom identified by the presence of a bathtub and the distinctive wooden ceiling ('天花木作保溫感佳').
Clear depiction of an indoor parking garage with marked spaces, matching '室內平面車位'.
Grand, well-lit entrance hall with marble floors and high-end finishes, matching '大樓門廳' and '迎賓大廳氣派'.
Image clearly shows exercise equipment (treadmills) and a spacious area suitable for fitness, matching '社區健身房'.
Focuses on the unique raised platform/desk area and adjacent storage, matching '客廳(另一角度)' and the specific tag '起居區與書櫃平台分區明確'.

tag_list: 起居區與書櫃平台分區明確
